/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and adds a sense of grandeur to the cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
